title: Teresa's story
creator_credit: John Anderson, Brent Productions and Wellington Community Law Centre
brief_description: This program was designed for use by schools and community groups, targets 12 to 17 year olds and people supporting them, and aims to inform about how the Child Protection system deals with reported abuse, the right of young people to personal safety and their legal rights under the Care and Protection Section of the Children, Young Persons and their Families Act, New Zealand.
